eu.barkmin.processing.scratch

Class ScratchStage

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.barkmin.processing.scratch.ScratchStage

  • public class ScratchStage
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the scratch stage. Only one object of this class can be created.

        public void addBackdrop(java.lang.String name,

        imagePath - a image path
